ygData.subject: Re: MESH / NETTED ARMOUR
ygData.msgSnippet: Have you headed down to innothule (sp?) swamp?  Even if you can t find it yourself, I ve often come across trolls who will sell it (albeit for high prices).
ygData.messageBody:
Have you headed down to innothule (sp?) swamp? Even if you can't find it
yourself, I've often come across trolls who will sell it (albeit for high
prices). Still, considering in Qeynos someone would have been happy to pay
12pp for netted gloves, it's probably worth the trip.


-----Original Message-----
From: Derek Wilson [mailto:spider_x_@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 9:40 AM
To: EQ-MONKS@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] MESH / NETTED ARMOUR

From: Derek Wilson <spider_x_@...>

Do I have to live in the game just to get mesh or netted armour? I have been
trying to find some ever since I got to level 8 (now I'm level 11) and still
have not found anything other than a mesh collar (whoop te do) What's up
with mesh? Why is there not enough of it? Must it be made or does it spawn
on certain NPC's? I'm wondering why I never see any vendors carry any mesh
items. Perhaps this is something I need to take up with Verant?

Thanks,
Derek Wilson
aka Spider-X

Linchao <Coalition of Fists>
